sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix"> <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <before>false</before> <description>Disables the 'Extend' UI Action on ast_contract</description> <name>Contract: Disable Extend UI Action </name> <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback> <script><![CDATA[(function(){ var uia = new GlideRecord("sys_ui_action"); if (uia.get("b6fd9e04bf6030007a6d257b3f073959")) { uia.active = false; uia.update(); } })();]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2019-03-20 11:10:43</sys_created_on> <sys_id>0d0a77a5c710330034d1f8d07a976385</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>Contract: Disable Extend UI Action </sys_name> <sys_package display_value="Contract Management - Form Layouts and Behavior" source="com.snc.contract_management.form_layouts">3018f8ec3cb1311068bcf327dfe37f71</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_0d0a77a5c710330034d1f8d07a976385</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2019-03-20 11:12:35</sys_updated_on> <unloadable>false</unloadable> </sys_script_fix> </record_update>
